#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <stdint.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base :: sync_with_stdio(false);
    cout.precision(1);
    //cin.tie(NULL);

    int times,n;
    double  area=0;

    cin>>times;
    for(int i=0; i<times;i++) {

        cin>>n;

        vector<double> X(n);
        vector<double> X1(n);
        for (vector<double>::iterator iter = X.begin(); iter != X.end(); ++iter)
        {
          cin >> *iter;
        }

        for (vector<double>::iterator iter = X1.begin(); iter != X1.end(); ++iter)
        {
          cin >> *iter;
        }

        int j=n-1;
        for (int l=0; l<n; l++) {
            area+=(X[j]+X[l])*(X1[j]-X1[l]);
            j=l;
        }

        area*=0.5;
        cout << fixed<< area<< endl;

        X.clear();
        X1.clear();
        area=0;
    }

    return 0;
}
